prime.utils.BitUtil

type
class
available in
swf
Helper class for working with bit flags

Static Methods

inline filter(bits : UInt, allowedBits : UInt) : UInt

Returns an UInt where only the bits that both parameters share are set. (AND operator..)

inline flip(bits : UInt, bitsToFlip : UInt) : UInt

method will return bits with the flags in bitsToFlip flipped If one the bits is set it will be unset, if one of the bits isn't set it will be set.

inline has(bits : UInt, flag : UInt) : Bool

Checks if any of the bits in 'flag' are set.

inline hasAll(bits : UInt, flags : Int) : Bool

Checks if all of the bits in 'flags' are set.

inline hasNone(bits : UInt, flag : UInt) : Bool

Checks if none of the bits in 'flag' are set.

inline invert(bits : UInt) : UInt

Method will change all 1s to 0's and 0's to 1's
